title: Please help me Riot.
body: I was going to gift my little brother project yi for his birthday, but i messed up. I accidentally purchased it instead. Also, when i first started league i used all of my refunds. If there is literally anything that i can do, please tell me. I will buy another refund if i can. My little brothers username is krusher10. please help us, we would REALLY appreciate it if you were to help Riot.

replies.body: I saw that you hadn't used the skin yet, so I've gone ahead and reversed that purchase and added the RP back for you ^_^!
oh...my...GOD!!!! THANK YOU SO MUCH! YOU DESERVE A MUTHAFUGGIN RAISE MY DOOD! YOU ARE OFFICIALLY MY HERO!

Aw shucks, I'm just here to help my dude!

Speaking of hero I forgot to add this in my first response.....

http://i.giphy.com/QwH7v7J1tBrq0.gif
